orderUnit.PSOrder: $alarmTime = get-date $alarmTime = $alarmTime.AddSeconds( $0 ) $nowTime = get-date $tsSeconds = ($alarmTime - $nowTime).Seconds $timeSpan = New-TimeSpan -Seconds $tsSeconds $timer = New-Object System.Timers.Timer Register-ObjectEvent -InputObject $timer -EventName Elapsed -Action { [System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox]::Show("알람!!" , "Alert!") } | out-null $timer.Autoreset = $false $timer.Interval = $timeSpan.TotalMilliseconds $timer.Enabled = $true $alarmTime.Hour.ToString()+"시 " + $alarmTime.Minute.ToString()+"분 " + $alarmTime.Second.ToString()+ "초"
